I think the biggest challenge for me was the perfect song structure because the chorus is a double-chorus and I wanted to tease the lyrics in the drop but not reveal the whole lyric line until the bridge. @billboarddance We definitely exaggerated the process in the video. In reality, The Monsters & Strangerz, who wrote the demo with Jasmine, sent it to me and asked if I would wanna work on the record and I produced the song while Jasmine had no clue I was working on it.
